title: FPS
body: my FPS is unstable. I  do not know why

replies.body:
Hey there,

Could you be more specific, perhaps provide your system specs, resolution, what settings you're running at, etc.

For now, here is a general guide to help you [troubleshoot issues relating to your FPS](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting).
